mapper.insert: insert into RoomReview (review_id, user_id, room_id, review_writer, review_stars, review_ctt, created_id) VALUES (#{review_id}, #{user_id}, #{room_id}, #{review_writer}, #{review_stars}, #{review_ctt}, #{created_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE Room r SET r.room_stars_avg = (SELECT AVG(rr.review_stars) FROM RoomReview rr WHERE rr.room_id = #{room_id}) WHERE r.room_id = #{room_id}
